title: Morrowind [mod] Wizards Island + patch
description:
Wizard's Island it's very big mod for The Elder Scrolls III - Morrowind game made by Wizard's Island Team. Unfortunately it seems they are not exist anymore and there is a problem to download this mod, that's the reason. Maybe they thought they no need anymore, but it's wrong!

It's just mod, so you need TES 3 - Morrowind and Tribunal, also there is a patch if you have Bloodmoon. WHat Wizard's Island offer to you:
Â· Over 400 "Cell" Areas.
Â· Over 3 Hours of music.
Â· Tons of characters.
Â· New creatures, items, spells (only for a boss creature atm.) weapons & armors.

Installation: SImple copy Data FIles do Morrowind Data FIles and set mod in launcher (2 or 3 files), so as always. More information inside ReadMe files.

I heard about some problem with second big mod - Tamriel Rebuilt, anyway you can try anyway, or just install Morrowind double
